english.segment1: I will lay me down. At Your feet in worship. And listen to the sweetest sound of all
english.segment2: Oh God You are my God. How my heart it longs for You. I'm thirsty for Your presence in my world. I cry out night and day for more. To hold the majesty of You
english.segment3: My God You stand alone. And I worship at Your throne. I will look to see Your power and glory. Jesus Lord of all
